author: rklar@thehill.com (Rebecca Klar)
title: Number of coronavirus cases worldwide tops 1 million
description: More than 1 million coronavirus cases have been confirmed globally and over 51,000 deaths have been reported worldwide due to the virus, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University.The U.S. has the most number of confirmed cases...
content:
More than 1 million coronavirus cases have been confirmed globally and over 51,000 deaths have been reported worldwide due to the virus, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University.
The U.S. has the most number of confirmed cases, though U.S. lawm… [+2146 chars]
